{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Fossilized Dino |image = [[File:Fossilized Dino.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Fossilized Dino''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== The '''Fossilized Dino''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil Part]] that can be obtained as soon as the [[Galar]] Region is reached. ==Details== '''Fossilized Dino''' parts can be [[Fossilized Dino#Uses|combined]] with other Fossil Parts at the Fossil Master to create new Pok√©mon. ==Mine Layout== The '''Fossilized Dino''' appears in the Underground as a 5x4 sized object.

[[File:FossilizedDinoMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Location !! Fossils !! Reward!! Cost |- | rowspan=2|[[Shops#Galar|Stow-on-Side]] || 1x Fossilized Dino [[File:Fossilized Dino.png|30px]]
1x [[Fossilized Fish]] [[File:Fossilized Fish.png|30px]] || [[File:Arctovish.png|40px]] Arctovish || rowspan=2|25,000 {{Questpoints}} |- | 1x Fossilized Dino [[File:Fossilized Dino.png|30px]]
1x [[Fossilized Bird]] [[File:Fossilized Bird.png|30px]] || [[File:Arctozolt.png|40px]] Arctozolt |} ==Acquisition== '''Fossilized Dino''' parts can be found in the [[Underground]] and traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]]. {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
